backend/main.mo: Defines a product canister with add, fetch, filter, and grouping functions backed by a Map store.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old product data to a new format by adding pricing fields and computing discounted prices.
feature_evidence.json: Holds feature evidence records linking features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains human-written summaries for all frontend files and components.
frontend/.env: Defines Vite environment variables for the app name and slug.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining color tokens, dark mode variants, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that loads products, groups them by brand, and renders hero, brand, and about sections.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Renders the about page with branding text, feature icons, and informational content.
frontend/src/components/BrandSection.tsx: Displays a section header and grid of product cards for a single brand.
frontend/src/components/BrandsSection.ts: Shows informational cards describing the Turtle Wax and 3M brands.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable alert-style component for displaying empty or error states.
frontend/src/components/HomeHero.tsx: Renders the homepage hero section with a title, description, and a decorative banner image.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product with image fallback logic, pricing details, and optional tags.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Shows the site footer with branding, current year, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides a responsive header with logo and navigation, including mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Exports centralized branding values such as app name, slug, and tagline.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches all products from the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom theme with light and dark mode color variables.
frontend/src/lib/pricing.ts: Provides utilities for formatting INR currency and calculating discount percentages.
frontend/src/lib/productImages.ts: Maps product brand/name pairs to static image paths and exposes a lookup helper.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, branding guidelines, image requirements, features, and architectural notes for the Urban Wax Studio site.
